docs.lead_paragraph: Also on the Minute, a verdict for Amanda Knox and Brokeback Mountain makes it to the opera house.
docs.snippet: Also on the Minute, a verdict for Amanda Knox and Brokeback Mountain makes it to the opera house.

headline.print_headline: Obesity Is Found to Gain Its Hold in Earliest Years
headline.main: Obesity Is Found to Gain Its Hold in Earliest Years

docs.abstract: Study published in The New England Journal of Medicine shows that obesity gains its hold in a child's early years; research involving more than 7,000 children finds that a third of those who were overweight in kindergarten were obese by eighth grade, and almost every child who was very obese remained that way; findings may reshape approaches to combating the nation's obesity epidemic.
docs.lead_paragraph: Experts say the results of a major new study may reshape approaches to combating the nation’s obesity epidemic, suggesting that efforts must start much earlier and focus more on the children at greatest risk.
docs.snippet: Experts say the results of a major new study may reshape approaches to combating the nation’s obesity epidemic, suggesting that efforts must start much earlier and focus more on the children at greatest risk.

docs.lead_paragraph: Bill Clinton made major changes to his diet after heart trouble, and now his foundation is getting an honor for helping in the battle against heart disease.
docs.snippet: Bill Clinton made major changes to his diet after heart trouble, and now his foundation is getting an honor for helping in the battle against heart disease.

headline.print_headline: Group Aims to Improve Food at Pa. Corner Stores
headline.main: Group Aims to Improve Food at Pa. Corner Stores

docs.lead_paragraph: From the outside, Carmen Medina's convenience store appears to be an oasis in the food desert of gritty north Philadelphia, from its bright yellow-and-white striped awnings to the fake palm tree sculptures on the sidewalk.
docs.snippet: From the outside, Carmen Medina's convenience store appears to be an oasis in the food desert of gritty north Philadelphia, from its bright yellow-and-white striped awnings to the fake palm tree sculptures on the sidewalk.
